ibmdlsVirtualRingSegmentNumber.name: ibmdlsVirtualRingSegmentNumber
ibmdlsVirtualRingSegmentNumber.description: The token ring segment number used in all frames passed to or from the IBM 6611 Data Link Switching function.

ibmdlsFrameFilterType.name: ibmdlsFrameFilterType
ibmdlsFrameFilterType.description: The type of SNA filtering applied using the ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterTable and ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterTable. If this field = permit(2), then all filters defined for SNA use the action of permitting frames to be forwarded if they meet the criteria given by the source and destination address values. If this field = deny(1), then all filters defined for SNA use the action of denying frames to be forwarded if they meet the criteria given by the source and destination address values.

ibmdlsNameFilterType.name: ibmdlsNameFilterType
ibmdlsNameFilterType.description: The type of NetBIOS filtering applied using the ibmdlsLocalNameFilterTable and ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterTable. If this field = permit(2), then all filters defined for NetBIOS use the action of permitting frames to be forwarded if they meet the criteria given by the source and destination address values. If this field = deny(1), then all filters defined for NetBIOS use the action of denying frames to be forwarded if they meet the criteria given by the source and destination address values.

ibmdlsRouterTable.name: ibmdlsRouterTable
ibmdlsRouterTable.description: A table of information regarding all routers participating in Data Link Switching.

ibmdlsRouterEntry.name: ibmdlsRouterEntry
ibmdlsRouterEntry.description: Information for a single participating router.

ibmdlsRouterAddress.name: ibmdlsRouterAddress
ibmdlsRouterAddress.description: The IP address of the router participating in Data Link Switching.

ibmdlsRouterStatus.name: ibmdlsRouterStatus
ibmdlsRouterStatus.description: The current state of the remote connection

ibmdlsRouterDefinedBy.name: ibmdlsRouterDefinedBy
ibmdlsRouterDefinedBy.description: The origin of this entry. user(1) indicates that this router is defined via the Configuration Program. system(2) indicates that this router was defined automatically as a result of a connection request from another router.

ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterTable.name: ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterTable
ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterTable.description: The SNA local frame filter table. This table contains information regarding the filtering of SNA frames received from local LAN segments.

ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterEntry.name: ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterEntry
ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterEntry.description: Filter information for a MAC address source-destination pair.

ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterID.name: ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterID
ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterID.description: A unique identifier for this filter.

ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterSrcAddress.name: ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterSrcAddress
ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterSrcAddress.description: The source MAC address that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterSrcMask.name: ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterSrcMask
ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterSrcMask.description: A mask indicating the bits of the source address considered significant when using the filter. For every bit equal to one in the mask, the same bit in the source address is considered significant.

ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterDestAddress.name: ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterDestAddress
ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterDestAddress.description: The destination MAC address that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterDestMask.name: ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterDestMask
ibmdlsLocalFrameFilterDestMask.description: A mask indicating the bits of the destination address considered significant when using the filter. For every bit equal to one in the mask, the same bit in the destination address is considered significant.

ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterTable.name: ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterTable
ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterTable.description: The SNA remote frame filter table. This table contains information regarding the filtering of SNA frames received from other participating DLS routers.

ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterEntry.name: ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterEntry
ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterEntry.description: Filter information for a MAC address source-destination pair.

ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterID.name: ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterID
ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterID.description: A unique identifier for this filter.

ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterSrcAddress.name: ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterSrcAddress
ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterSrcAddress.description: The source MAC address that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterSrcMask.name: ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterSrcMask
ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterSrcMask.description: A mask indicating the bits of the source address considered significant when using the filter. For every bit equal to one in the mask, the same bit in the source address is considered significant.

ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterDestAddress.name: ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterDestAddress
ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterDestAddress.description: The destination MAC address that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterDestMask.name: ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterDestMask
ibmdlsRemoteFrameFilterDestMask.description: A mask indicating the bits of the destination address considered significant when using the filter. For every bit equal to one in the mask, the same bit in the destination address is considered significant.

ibmdlsLocalNameFilterTable.name: ibmdlsLocalNameFilterTable
ibmdlsLocalNameFilterTable.description: The NetBIOS local name filter table. This table contains information regarding the filtering of NetBIOS frames received from local LAN segments.

ibmdlsLocalNameFilterEntry.name: ibmdlsLocalNameFilterEntry
ibmdlsLocalNameFilterEntry.description: Filter information for a NetBIOS source-destination name pair.

ibmdlsLocalNameFilterID.name: ibmdlsLocalNameFilterID
ibmdlsLocalNameFilterID.description: A unique identifier for this filter.

ibmdlsLocalNameFilterSrcAddress.name: ibmdlsLocalNameFilterSrcAddress
ibmdlsLocalNameFilterSrcAddress.description: The source NetBIOS name that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsLocalNameFilterDestAddress.name: ibmdlsLocalNameFilterDestAddress
ibmdlsLocalNameFilterDestAddress.description: The destination NetBIOS name that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterTable.name: ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterTable
ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterTable.description: The NetBIOS name filter table. This table contains information regarding the filtering of NetBIOS frames received from other participating DLS routers.

ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterEntry.name: ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterEntry
ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterEntry.description: Filter information for a NetBIOS source-destination name pair.

ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterID.name: ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterID
ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterID.description: A unique identifier for this filter.

ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterSrcAddress.name: ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterSrcAddress
ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterSrcAddress.description: The source NetBIOS name that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterDestAddress.name: ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterDestAddress
ibmdlsRemoteNameFilterDestAddress.description: The destination NetBIOS name that this filter is applied to.

ibmdlsDefaultDestTable.name: ibmdlsDefaultDestTable
ibmdlsDefaultDestTable.description: Table of default routers for MAC addresses.

ibmdlsDefaultDestEntry.name: ibmdlsDefaultDestEntry
ibmdlsDefaultDestEntry.description: Mapping of a MAC address to a default router.

ibmdlsDefaultDestAddress.name: ibmdlsDefaultDestAddress
ibmdlsDefaultDestAddress.description: The destination address that this table entry applies to.

ibmdlsDefaultRouterAddress.name: ibmdlsDefaultRouterAddress
ibmdlsDefaultRouterAddress.description: The default router used for reaching the destination address in ibmdlsDefaultDestAddress.

ibmdlsDefaultNBDestTable.name: ibmdlsDefaultNBDestTable
ibmdlsDefaultNBDestTable.description: Table of default routers for NetBIOS names.

ibmdlsDefaultNBDestEntry.name: ibmdlsDefaultNBDestEntry
ibmdlsDefaultNBDestEntry.description: Mapping of a NetBIOS name to a default router.

ibmdlsDefaultNBDestName.name: ibmdlsDefaultNBDestName
ibmdlsDefaultNBDestName.description: The destination NetBIOS name that this table entry applies to.

ibmdlsDefaultNBRouterAddress.name: ibmdlsDefaultNBRouterAddress
ibmdlsDefaultNBRouterAddress.description: The default router used for reaching the destination name in ibmdlsDefaultNBDestName.

ibmdlsStationTable.name: ibmdlsStationTable
ibmdlsStationTable.description: Table of configuration information on SNA stations attached to this router.

ibmdlsStationEntry.name: ibmdlsStationEntry
ibmdlsStationEntry.description: Information on a single SNA station attached to this router.

ibmdlsStationIfIndex.name: ibmdlsStationIfIndex
ibmdlsStationIfIndex.description: The value of IfIndex for the port to which this station is attached.

ibmdlsStationAddress.name: ibmdlsStationAddress
ibmdlsStationAddress.description: The SDLC address of this station.

ibmdlsStationTransmitWindowCount.name: ibmdlsStationTransmitWindowCount
ibmdlsStationTransmitWindowCount.description: The number of SDLC information frames to send to this station before turning the line around to get a response.

ibmdlsStationRetransmitCount.name: ibmdlsStationRetransmitCount
ibmdlsStationRetransmitCount.description: The number of contiguous information frame bursts that will be transmitted to this station before declaring a permanent transmission error.

ibmdlsStationRetransmitThreshold.name: ibmdlsStationRetransmitThreshold
ibmdlsStationRetransmitThreshold.description: The number of information frame transmissions allowed as a percentage of total information frame transmissions. The specified rate is the maximum rate of retransmissions allowed above which an error log entry will be make.

ibmdlsStationForceDisconnectTimeout.name: ibmdlsStationForceDisconnectTimeout
ibmdlsStationForceDisconnectTimeout.description: The number of seconds that the IBM 6611 will wait after requesting a disconnect from the link (DISC) before forcing a disconnect.

ibmdlsStationMaxIfieldSize.name: ibmdlsStationMaxIfieldSize
ibmdlsStationMaxIfieldSize.description: The value in bytes of the maximum I-field size (a multiple of 256 plus 9).

ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollTimeout.name: ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollTimeout
ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollTimeout.description: The length of time (in tenths of seconds) that the primary station will wait for a response from the secondary station.

ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollCount.name: ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollCount
ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollCount.description: The number of times that the primary station will poll the secondary station unsuccessfully before marking the station as not working.

ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollThreshold.name: ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollThreshold
ibmdlsStationPrimaryRepollThreshold.description: The number of repolls as a percentage of the total polls sent to the secondary station. The specified percentage equals the maximum rate of repolls allowed, above which the IBM 6611 declares that a temporary error has occurred and logs an entry in the system error log.

ibmdlsStationPrimarySlowListTimeout.name: ibmdlsStationPrimarySlowListTimeout
ibmdlsStationPrimarySlowListTimeout.description: The number of seconds that the primary station will wait between polls to stations on the slow list.

ibmdlsStationSrcAddress.name: ibmdlsStationSrcAddress
ibmdlsStationSrcAddress.description: The token ring physical address used for this station.

ibmdlsStationDestAddress.name: ibmdlsStationDestAddress
ibmdlsStationDestAddress.description: The token ring physical address to which this station should be connected. If this information is not available the IBM 6611 Network Processor will return a length of zero for this object.

ibmdlsCirTable.name: ibmdlsCirTable
ibmdlsCirTable.description: Table of information on DLS circuits active on this router.

ibmdlsCirIfIndex.name: ibmdlsCirIfIndex
ibmdlsCirIfIndex.description: The value of IfIndex for the interface supporting this circuit.

ibmdlsCirSrcAddress.name: ibmdlsCirSrcAddress
ibmdlsCirSrcAddress.description: The MAC address of the source of this circuit.

ibmdlsCirSrcSap.name: ibmdlsCirSrcSap
ibmdlsCirSrcSap.description: The SAP identifier of the source of this circuit.

ibmdlsCirDestAddress.name: ibmdlsCirDestAddress
ibmdlsCirDestAddress.description: The MAC address of the destination of this circuit.

ibmdlsCirDestSap.name: ibmdlsCirDestSap
ibmdlsCirDestSap.description: The SAP identifier of the destination of this circuit.

ibmdlsCirPartnerRouterAddress.name: ibmdlsCirPartnerRouterAddress
ibmdlsCirPartnerRouterAddress.description: The IP address of the partner router used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkState.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkState
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkState.description: The state of the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkSubState.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkSubState
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkSubState.description: The sub-state of the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkRouting.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkRouting
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkRouting.reference: IBM Token-ring Network: Architecture Reference (SC30-3374), see 'Routing Information Field'.
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkRouting.description: The routing information field used by the local link portion of this circuit. The routing information field consists of a 2-byte routing control field and up to eight 2-byte route designators.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsSent.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsSent
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsSent.description: The number of test commands sent by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsFail.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsFail
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsFail.description: The number of test commands failed by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsRcv.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsRcv
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkTestCmdsRcv.description: The number of test commands received by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktSent.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktSent
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktSent.description: The number of sequenced data packets sent by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktResent.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktResent
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktResent.description: The number of sequenced data packets resent by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkMaxContResent.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkMaxContResent
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkMaxContResent.description: The maximum number of contiguous resendings by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktRcv.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktRcv
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkDataPktRcv.description: The number of sequenced data packets received by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkInvalidPktRcv.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkInvalidPktRcv
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkInvalidPktRcv.description: The number of invalid packets received by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkAdpRcvErr.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkAdpRcvErr
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkAdpRcvErr.description: The number of data-detected receive errors by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkAdpSendErr.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkAdpSendErr
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkAdpSendErr.description: The number of data-detected transmit errors by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkRcvInactiveTimeouts.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkRcvInactiveTimeouts
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkRcvInactiveTimeouts.description: The number of inactivity timeouts received by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdPollsSent.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdPollsSent
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdPollsSent.description: The number of command polls sent by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdRepollsSent.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdRepollsSent
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdRepollsSent.description: The number of command repolls sent by the local link station used by this circuit.

ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdContRepolls.name: ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdContRepolls
ibmdlsCirLocalLinkCmdContRepolls.description: The number of continuous repolls sent by the local link station used by this circuit.
